parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Moves the marker. If position is given in 3D format, <tt>z</tt> coordinate is stored with the marker and will be used when marker is passed to commands like [[createVehicle]], [[createUnit]], [[createAgent]], [[createMine]], [[setVehiclePosition]] for example. When [[Object]] is used for position, [[PositionWorld]] of the object is used. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> markerName '''setMarkerPosLocal''' pos </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Array]] - format [[Position2D]], [[PositionAGL]] or [[Object]] (since Arma 3 v1.93.145584) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"MarkerOne" '''setMarkerPosLocal''' [[getMarkerPos]] "MarkerTwo";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]], [[setMarkerBrushLocal]], [[setMarkerColorLocal]], [[setMarkerDirLocal]], [[setMarkerShapeLocal]], [[setMarkerSizeLocal]], [[setMarkerTextLocal]], [[setMarkerTypeLocal]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
